## Avatar.faceMesh property

Mesh for changing facial expressions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get faceMesh(): THREE.Mesh<THREE.BufferGeometry, THREE.Material | THREE.Material[]> | undefined;
```

## Remarks

For VRM, use `avatar.vrm.expressionManager` instead of this mesh.

see [VRMExpressionManager](https://pixiv.github.io/three-vrm/packages/three-vrm/docs/classes/VRMExpressionManager.html)
